Text: The Lost World (TV series):  The show premiered in the United States in the fall of 1999 (after the TV-movie/pilot aired in February on DirecTV and then on the cable television channel TNT in April), it ran for three seasons before it was cancelled on a cliffhanger in 2002 after funding for a fourth season fell through.
Triplets:<The Lost World

Text: The Lost World (TV series):  To this day, the cliffhanger remains unresolved.
